Header.title: Live to dance!
Header.paragraph: Highly enthusiatic individuals aiming to bring out the best talent in you!

About.paragraph: Started off in the year 2020 with a motive of spreading the knowledge that we gained through various guru's. In all the chaos of our daily routine, little bit of fun and dance in the weekend is the only thing that charges us up for a fresh week. The best way of learning dance is thought in the organisation. With your help we will reach greater heights!.

Features.title: Up-To-Date
Features.text: All the information regarding the classes will be contacted to the student and parents.

Features.title: Performance Ready
Features.text: Choreographed items can be performed anywhere apart for the organization itself.

Features.title: Social Media
Features.text: Haven't you still checked out our ocial webpages? Scroll-down to have a look at our EXCELLENT students.

Features.title: Entertainment
Features.text: Fun and entertainment should be a part of any extra-curricular activity for students, students will enjoy dancing with us!.
